revised_title: Deep Water Offshore Oil Production: Economic and Technological Challenges
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Offshore Oil Production
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities of deep water offshore oil production. It explores the geological factors that determine the prospectivity of deep water regions, the technological and economic aspects of drilling in deep waters, and the environmental factors that impact the development of these resources. The article also highlights the multidisciplinary skills required for the development of deep water oil fields and the potential economic implications of these international activities.
